name: Pussyfoot
description:
Welcome Kitties! The world is a dangerous place for a pussy. Dodge and weave across multiple platforms as try not to get blasted by lasers, run over by planes or maybe worst off all, get wet…  Do you have what it takes to pussyfoot your way around the obstacles?

Features:
Slick movement- Jump and dodge your way around obstacles.
Trouble on the horizon -  Planes, rain, and even lasers are in your way.
Feel the beat - Listen to a sick soundtrack that predicts danger.

Pussyfoot was developed by 4 guys. who would have guessed it?
